resources.string: A matrix is a bidimensional arrangement or two-dimensional table of numbers consisting of abstract quantities that can be added and multiplied together. It is a provision of numerical and / or variable values (represented by letters), in columns and rows, of rectangular shape. A matrix is a square or rectangular table of data (called elements or entries of the matrix) arranged in rows and columns, where a row is each of the horizontal lines of the matrix and a column is each of the vertical lines of the matrix. A matrix with m rows and n columns is called matrix m x n; and a and n are called matrix dimensions.
